metadata.dc:author: Burgos-Cabrera, Germán
Virgen-Carrillo, Luis
Acoltzin-Vidal, Cuauhtémoc
metadata.dc:description: We describe a patient with a syncopal event who displayed an electrocardiographic tracing highly suggestive of Brugada syndrome. The coronary angiogram, however, showed unequivocal non-atheromatous coronary lesions.
metadata.dc:title: Isquemia miocárdica que semeja síndrome de Brugada.
[Myocardial ischemia mimicking the Brugada syndrome].
